channel.title: First attempt at Java OpenGL(Jogl)
channel.description:
Decided to make a simple program in jogl since I've been wanting to learn it to create a 3d game.
This application simply allows you to move around and look at the objects in the area.
Controls are:
[b]Up Arrow:[/b] Move the view up
[b]Down Arrow:[/b] Move the view down
[b]Left Arrow:[/b] Move the view left
[b]Right Arrow:[/b] Move the view right
[b]Z:[/b] Move forwards
[b]X:[/b] Move backwards [b] W:[/b] Rotate the screen upwards
[b]S:[/b] Rotate the screen downwards
[b]A:[/b] Rotate the screen left
[b]D:[/b] Rotate the screen right
[b]R:[/b] Reset Camera
[url=http://pastebin.com/VxJxwUmM]View Code Here (Run it too if you have Jogl installed)[/url]
[url=http://tinypic.com/r/20qlzpk/7]View Video Here[/url]

Decided to make a simple program in jogl since I’ve been wanting to learn it to create a 3d game.

This application simply allows you to move around and look at the objects in the area.
